evidence.claim: Upsure utilizes AWS services including Lambda and S3 for application hosting and data storage.
The company supports FHIR standards for healthcare data integration.
Upsure's services comply with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
Integration with X12 EDI transactions is part of Upsure's core functionalities.

icp.icp_reason: Upsure integrates X12 standards for health data exchange, aligning with API-first strategies.
